channel.title: I.P changing query
channel.description: My problem is that im on dynamic ip and my issue is if for some reason my box is reset would everyone on my server have to re download the client with my ip in or will it change automatic when i change it in my server files?

item.title: I.P changing query
item.dc:creator: @mr_ian mr ian
item.description:
@mr_ian wrote:

Thankyou sir i redirected to no-ip now so hopefully it should be ok from now on

item.title: I.P changing query
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

mr ian:

My problem is that im on dynamic ip and my issue is if for some reason my box is reset would everyone on my server have to re download the client with my ip in or will it change automatic when i change it in my server files?

If you have a No-IP account, itâ€™s no problem. The reason is because while you may restart and your IP change, running the No-IP client will contact the naming server, update the IP, and all future connections to your No-IP address will be redirected to you.

Read full topic
